titleStmt.title: Vocabulaire français et tamoul, par Beschi

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: A vocabulary of French words with their Tamil counterparts compiled, according to the title by Beschi. Arranged according to French alphabetical order — A-Z. Often documents entire Tamil phrases with a simple French meaning, such as idioms and expressions. Also documents Tamil word-phrases. Entry verbs are not lemmatized. Arabic numerals to mark page numbers are present, and each new letter is printed in large.

msItem.title: dictionnaire français-tamoul, Beschi
msItem.author: Beschi
msItem.incipit:
[title]
vocabulaire
françois et
tamoul. [body]
abaïe — அனுசாரம்…
abaissement — தாழ்த்துதல்…
abaissement, humilitie — கீழ்ப்படிதல்…
abaisser — தாழ்த்துகிறது…
S’abaisser — தாழ்த்துகிறது குனிகிறது…
abandon, delassement — கைவிடுதல்…
abandonne, debauche — குடியன் கேட்டவன்…

finalRubric.note: No Completion Statement. Manuscript complete, because entries upto ‘z’ are found, and the final page has a large empty space in it. Arabic numerals to mark page numbers are present, and each new letter is printed in large.

support.p: Same paper used in guard folios

supportDesc.foliation: Arabic numerals in every verso - top right. Each new alphabet (i.e., chapter) represented in large.

layoutDesc.layout: Divided into chaptersaccording to the French alphabet.

handNote.desc: Same hand for French and Tamil entries. Sporadic puḷḷi-s present, and never for the final vowel in a grapheme. French and Tamil counterpart separated by dotted line.

binding.p: Leather binding, with paper as support material

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 35.

encodingDesc.p: All conventions according to Tamil Lexicon.
